43.ara-name: كتاب الأدب عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:"The Prophet (ﷺ) would pare, or take from his mustache, and Ibrahim Khalilur-Rahman would do it (as well)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَصِّ الشَّارِبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Paring The Moustache
